question: A 17
statement_html:
For questions A17-A19 below, \(u\) and \(z\) are the complex numbers given below:

\[\begin{aligned} u &= 4-2i \\ z &= -1+3i \end{aligned}\]

A17: Compute \(uz\). Your answer should be in the form \(a+ib\) where \(a\) and \(b\) are real numbers.
statement_latex:
For questions \textbf{A17-A19} below, $u$ and $z$ are the complex
numbers given below:

\begin{align*}
u &= 4-2i \\ z &= -1+3i 
\end{align*}

\textbf{A17:} Compute $uz$. Your answer should be in the form $a+ib$
where $a$ and $b$ are real numbers.
statement_raw:
For questions '''A17-A19''' below, <math>u</math> and <math>z</math> are the complex numbers given below:

<math> \begin{align} u &= 4-2i \\ z &= -1+3i \end{align} </math>

'''A17:''' Compute <math>uz</math>. Your answer should be in the form <math>a+ib</math> where <math>a</math> and <math>b</math> are real numbers.
